name: Join Me! (V)
Lore: '''...And together, we can rule the galaxy as father and son!''',
Text: 'During battle, lose 1 Force to target a Skywalker present with your character armed with a lightsaber. Target is power = 0. OR If you just hit a Skywalker with a lightsaber, opponent must lose 3 Force or place Skywalker (and all cards on them) in Used Pile.',
